title: Aqours Live Day 2!

Then Iâ€™ll be depending on you all today, too. ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Since youâ€™re feeling better today, Chika-san, you better dry your hair and lay out your futon yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Is anyone tired today?
